content:
content: "**[[size x-large]]项目描述[[/size]]：**一副由[[size x-large]]████公司[[/size]]生产的[[size x-large]]███眼镜[[/size]]，会使[[size x-large]]佩戴者[[/size]]认为其所看到的[[size x-large]]文字[[/size]]中的[[size x-large]]名词部分[[/size]]比[[size x-large]]其他部分[[/size]]要大一些。
**回收[[size x-large]]日期[[/size]]：**20██/██/██
**回收[[size x-large]]地点[[/size]]：**[[size x-large]]████公司专卖店[[/size]]。
**当前[[size x-large]]状态[[/size]]：**存放于Dr.K的[[size x-large]]办公室[[/size]]内。
**[[size x-large]]笔记[[/size]]：**//确实是大**亿**些。--Dr.K//"
author: A WILD COLLECTOR
